name: Eggstravaganza
description:
Eggstravaganza

The web version is very laggy and unstable. Please download the zip for .exe file or run main.py if you have python installed.

Objective: The objective of Eggstravaganza is to protect as many Easter eggs as possible by shooting bubbles, while avoiding bombs.

Controls: 

  • To shoot bubbles, click the mouse button, or hold down the left mouse button for continuous fire. 
  • You can change the direction of the bubbles by moving the mouse.

Credits: 

  • The font used in Eggstravaganza was created by fluffybanana101 and can be found at https://www.fontspace.com/pretty-pastel-font-f20708. 
  • Sound effects were generated from https://www.leshylabs.com/apps/sfMaker/,
  •  The music was generated using https://musiclab.chromeexperiments.com/Song-Maker/. 
  • The game's art, design, and programming were created by @sadbean on Discord and @animefanbhargav on other platforms.

Source code can be found on : https://github.com/animefanbhargav/Eggstravaganza
